    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model(float x,
             float y,
             float z,
             java.lang.String path)
        Creates a model loaded from an OBJ file
        Parameters:
        x - Position X for model
        y - Position Y for model
        z - Position Z for model
        path - Path to load model from (must be OBJ!)

    • Method Detail

      • translate

        public void translate(float x,
                      float y,
                      float z)
        Translate the model in world space
        Parameters:
        x - How much to translate X
        y - How much to translate Y
        z - How much to translate Z

      • rotate

        public void rotate(float angle,
                   float rx,
                   float ry,
                   float rz)
        Rotates the model
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle to be added to current angle (degrees)
        rx - Determines rotation for X axis
        ry - Determines rotation for Y axis
        rz - Determines rotation for Z axis

      • setColor

        public void setColor(int r,
                     int g,
                     int b)
        Set model color
        Parameters:
        r - Red color component
        g - Green color component
        b - Blue color component
